memory.title: Memory Settings
memory.description: Configure how AI remembers information across conversations
memory.enableMemoryDesc: Allow AI to remember information across conversations
memory.autoDetectDesc: Automatically extract preferences and facts from conversations
memory.injectPromptDesc: Inject memories into the AI system prompt
memory.clearConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all memories?
memory.addMemoryHint: Add memories to personalize AI responses
memory.contentPlaceholder: e.g., I prefer concise responses with code examples
memory.maxMemoriesDesc: Maximum number of memories to store. Oldest will be removed when limit is reached.
memory.promptPreviewDesc: Preview how memories are injected into AI prompts
memory.noMemoriesInjected: No memories will be injected (check settings)
memory.mem0ProviderDesc: Use Mem0 cloud service for advanced memory management with 26% higher accuracy
memory.localProviderDesc: Store memories locally in your browser
memory.enablePipelineDesc: Use two-phase pipeline for intelligent memory extraction (26% more accurate)
memory.semanticSearchDesc: Use AI embeddings for smarter memory retrieval
memory.autoDecayDesc: Reduce relevance of unused memories over time
memory.autoCleanupDesc: Automatically remove expired and unused memories
memory.defaultScopeDesc: New memories will use this scope by default
memory.cleanupDesc: This will remove expired memories and memories that have not been used in a long time (except pinned ones).

customInstructions.title: Custom Instructions
customInstructions.description: Customize how AI responds across all conversations
customInstructions.aboutYouHint: Share context about yourself for more relevant responses.
customInstructions.aboutYouPlaceholder: e.g., I'm a React developer who prefers concise explanations...
customInstructions.responseStyleHint: Specify preferred format, detail level, or style.
customInstructions.responseStylePlaceholder: e.g., Be direct. Use bullet points. Include code examples.
customInstructions.advancedPlaceholder: Enter additional instructions for the AI...

rules.title: IDE Rules
rules.description: System instruction and behavior rules for AI editors (.cursorrules, .windsurfrules, etc.)
rules.resetConfirm: Reset to default template? Unsaved changes will be lost.

knowledgeBase.title: Knowledge Base
knowledgeBase.addFileDesc: Add text content that will be available as context for conversations in this project.
knowledgeBase.uploadHint: Upload files or add content to build your knowledge base
knowledgeBase.addFileHint: Add files to provide context for AI
knowledgeBase.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this file from the knowledge base? This action cannot be undone.
knowledgeBase.deleteMultipleConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {count} files from the knowledge base? This action cannot be undone.
